pages.title: Where to find
pages.text: Sometimes there are shiny gems found in oceans, floating on top of the water, getting rocked back and forth by the waves. If you spend some time near or in the ocean you may find one yourself!

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: The source of these gems is a delicate flower that grows on the seabed in small groups. The plant emits a faint glow and, if you wear Glow Vision Goggles, it also sparkles. Wait next to it until it is fully grown, releases its precious treasure and then collect it. After you got one, you will be able to see the plant for what it is.
